open.title: Netstream Outage | Fourways
open.description: Netstream has informed us of a network outage affecting The Pinnacle, Il Villaggio and Northern View, affected clients will experience no connectivity.Netstream engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.
